summary: In 2009, six friends arrive at an isolated cabin to enjoy a long weekend in the snow. An epic snowstorm interrupts their vacation, trapping them on the mountain and resurrecting the haunting ghosts of the Donner Party.
cast: James Kyson|George Stults|Tiffany|Penny Vital|Danielle De Luca|Robert Michael Ryan|Michael Berryman|Mickey Jones|Kymberly Jane|Grady Lee Richmond|Jay Preston|John Dobroth|Elisa Eliot|Skyelar Rae|Steve Thomas Sr.|Ben Von Dielingen|Machete Bang Bang|Dennis Devine|Kelli Freiberg|Peter Freiberg|Lela Henke-Dobroth|Greg McDougall|Robert Reynoso|Amber Schmidt|Jason Robert Stephens|Carisa Torpey|Frank Torpey|Al Weigand
title: Necrosis
